text: "Sober" is a power pop song by American singer-songwriter Pink. It was released on November 3, 2008. It is from her fifth studio album, Funhouse. The song's lyrics are about sobriety. They are also about the vices different people choose. The song's backstory is about Pink being at a party that she did not want to be in. It was written by Pink and Kara DioGuardi. Danja and Marcella Araica also helped write it. ==References== Category:2008 songs Category:2000s ballads Category:Pink (singer) songs
title: Sober (song)
